articles.description: Liverpool agree a compensation deal with Feyenoord to allow Arne Slot to become their new manager, succeeding Jurgen Klopp.
articles.title: Arne Slot: Liverpool agree compensation deal for Feyenoord boss

articles.description: Arda Guler scores on his first La Liga start as Real Madrid close in on the title with victory at Real Sociedad.
articles.title: Teenager Guler scores as Real Madrid close on title

articles.description: Leicester City are promoted back to the Premier League after Leeds United are beaten at QPR.
articles.title: Leicester City promoted to Premier League after Leeds lose at QPR

articles.description: Jonny Bairstow's astonishing 108 from 48 balls leads Punjab Kings to the highest-ever successful T20 run-chase.
articles.title: IPL 2024: Jonny Bairstow century as Punjab Kings set T20 record

articles.description: England face France in Bordeaux on Saturday in a third Women's Six Nations Grand Slam decider in a row.
articles.title: Women's Six Nations 2024: 'Different' England can 'dial up'

articles.description: Watch Sportscene and follow live text as Dundee United seek to clinch the Scottish Championship by avoiding defeat at Airdrieonians.
articles.title: Watch: Airdrieonians vs Dundee United: Scottish Championship - BBC Sport

articles.description: Bayern Munich boss Thomas Tuchel won't be 'influenced' by a petition urging him to remain at the club.
articles.title: Bayern Munich: Thomas Tuchel 'not influenced' by petition urging him to stay

articles.description: BBC Sport football expert Chris Sutton takes on Ride's Andy Bell & Steve Queralt to make predictions for this weekend's Premier League games.
articles.title: Sutton's Premier League predictions v Ride

articles.description: Emma Hayes says Chelsea have to be “perfect” to be able to progress from their Women’s Champions League semi-final against Barcelona.
articles.title: Chelsea v Barcelona: Blues have to be 'perfect' to reach final

articles.description: Manchester United boss Erik ten Hag bans three media outlets from asking questions at his news conference on Friday.
articles.title: Erik ten Hag: Manchester United boss snubs journalists in news conference
